item.title: Keep Aaron Cutting
item.description: Aaron, 89 years old, had his shop destroyed during the riots. Help him out at http://t.co/gjnDepf #keepaaroncutting #londonriots
item.content:encoded: Aaron, 89 years old, had his shop destroyed during the riots. Help him out at http://t.co/gjnDepf #keepaaroncutting #londonriots "I will probably have to close because I haven’t got insurance and I can’t afford the repairs,” - Aaron Let's use the internet, spread this and all donate a pound so Aaron can get his shop back up and running so he will not have to worry how he's going to make a living at his old age. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: keepaaroncutting.blogspot.com

item.content:encoded: Twitter Begins Testing t.co Shortened Links in the Wild http://tcrn.ch/ndhWqC Starting today, Twitter will begin testing its link-wrapping feature which will automatically shorten all URL’s 20 characters long or greater into t.co-wrapped links. This test will affect a certain percentage of tweets posted publicly through the service, or sent out via direct message. Link - Trackbacks

You may have seen David Cameron on the news today, anointing himself head of the "New Moral Army", promising a "fightback" against rioters, and praising (at 0.53) "the million people on Facebook who've signed up to support the police".
